doc.field: Pile of materials related to WTC and recovery operations. Includes things sent to Spadafora in response to 9/11: Photograph with double exposure of standing WTC and Ground Zero (backstory by photographer with photo); some sympathy cards; some drawings/artwork; photo of firefighter Gary Geidec who died on 9/11; children's drawings. Book "Closure" by Lt. William Keegan Jr inscribed by author to Spadafora. Book "The Guys." Photo of Spadafora at "Last Day of Ground Zero, May 30, 2002, Closing Ceremony" taken by Gary Susan. Various memos (document preservation, etc.), lists of missing FDNY members/identified/kin notifications, lab results from debris samples for PCBs etc, debris handling procedures. Many articles, tearsheets about 9/11 and remains recovery. Much material from 2001-02, but also much press material from ten year anniversary in 2011. WTC Medical Monitoring report for Spadafora, 2001-02. Response of FDNY to the NY Post's "tasteless" cartoon of Dec 2, 2003, apparently re: firefighters striking up relationships with dead firefighters' wives. Includes FDNY Dept Order 61 of July 4, 2003, which "caught up" on a complete list with photos of all members who died on 9/11/01. Booklets re: commissioning of USS New York (Nov 7, 2009). Packet of vendor material on a facepiece respirator with artifact respirator included. Metal plate "No whining." (Includes digital formats)
